name: Animated Stars Background (Thread-only)
description:
Animated Twinking Stars background, applies on threads only.

I followed the twinkling stars background tutorial. You can find it 

http://www.script-tutorials.com/night-sky-with-twinkling-stars/
additional_info:
Doesn't work well on: FlexPink, FlexSpace, FlexStars, FlexWhite, Moonscape. 

Took me a few days to make this, learned a lot, still a lot to learn regarding efficiency (Did you know: translation using pixels is up to 3x more efficient than using percentages, computation wise). Hmm, some of the background: transparent selectors are probably applied outside of threads, but it's not a big deal. The main reason the animation doesn't apply to regular forums is because I felt it would save time on forums where you only stay for less than a minute anyway.
